reviews.text: The food is ok so is the price, however customer service is not good at all.
The soup was so delicious. The owners are very kind and friendly. The fried fish must be the best I‚Äôve ever had. Highly recommended.
Love this take out I haven‚Äôt had this dish in 30 years! It was delicious great portion and reasonably priced. I couldn‚Äôt stop eating it! The two women behind the counter were kind!
Kay nanas bistro Bon manche sel natanael ki vole boulet mounn

Walked in with a polite greeting and was met with annoyed stares by everyone in there. I looked past it and just asked to be served and to see what food was available and was told ‚Äúno.‚Äù and that was it. No they weren‚Äôt closing. It was 1:45pm Sunday afternoon. Will not be returning. One of the worst experiences.
The food is delicious and the price is great, you also get a good portion.

They make the best  rice and peas with some oxtails.
The best Haitian food in Queens.
Service was tremendously slow food was dry not worth the what or the money spent.
It's very clean and the food is delicious especially the soup.
I had a great experience the food tasted very good and fresh.the best restaurant in Queens
Great

The only place that can compete the Greeks !
Amazing !

"Stewed Conch" is my favorite Haitian dish, and that's what I always get from Nana's on Sundays when it's available.  Unfortunately at this place, that dish, the "Stewed Conch" always emits a strong fishy smell.  I stopped getting food from‚Ä¶

Nana's Bistro is an awesome experience. The moment you walk in you feel as if you're home with family and friends. The food is delicious, the staff courteous and more importantly the Caribbean atmosphere is oustanding.
Trust me. This is my spot. Food is beyond good!
Great food and service.
Very Good food for the Better price. Very Good Service.

Food is ok not really authentic Haitian food...and there customer service needs to improve ...as always black establishment s always have attitudes  like your not spending your hard earned money there!
Good food
Such Delicious food, great customer service, great prices!!
I come here all the time . The Staff is friendly and the food is great üòä‚Ä¶
best food in town
Price  and food great

I come here all the time, at least three times per week, Nana and every single staff there is polite, courteous and the food portions are always on point. I love the fish but honestly everything here taste amazing and always fresh. I‚Äôm‚Ä¶
Love This Place
Very clean, welcoming environment. Owners and staff are extremely customer oriented. And the food is great!
Good food
Great creole food
Wonderful

This was my first time there today. I heard about Nana's from a friend and she said the food was great. All I can say the food I did get was great. I'm a little disappointed that I didn't get my other order but was provided with a refund. Nana is polite and even with the mix up was very patient... I definitely will go back again.

The food is the best!!!!! The staff is very polite and efficient. My order is always accurate. I always leave with a smile on my face. Thanks Nana for providing the excellent customer service I always get.

Never tasted the food. The attitude was so bad the food would probably be worst. Walked in for the first time and asked what was available and for a menu and the lady was obviously not happy with serving customers or not happy answering a basic question. In any case it was very unnecessary and so I did not spend my money there
They have the most amazing dishes/pizza/ and salads!!!.. and the chicken Cesar slice is a must try!!!!! The staff is the best and always make you feel super welcomed!
The food is absolutely delicious. Service is top notch. Love love love this place.
1st time going there and I must say the rice was absolutely delicious. Never have I tasted rice so good. I would only go for the rice alone.
The lady who's selling the food is so rude she always have an attitude. Nana the restaurant owner is so nice but the lady she's too Damm rude
Great food but the server she got to much attitude I don‚Äôt like her wen I come by my food but the lady from the night she‚Äôs nice
Wonder Staff, Great Food, parking isn't the greatest. But if you are interested in trying some new food, give them a try
Freshest foods they make it on the spot and while you're waiting you can buy fresh ripe and well tasting smoothies or juices and the customers are very friendly.
The best oxtails in NYC. More meat for your money. Nana is a sweetheart. Very nice people.
Very friendly owners, love the colorful atmosphere inside the restaurant, food is delicious.
Awesome food made with love. A lot of choices so you'll never get enough :)
Great food, friendly owners, awesome location !
Love it! The food is amazing! I pray God continues to bless this business
Clean ,good food, good service.A touch of Haitian cuisine.Welcoming staff.
